contactInfo.address: 49 South Van Ness Avenue, San Francisco, CA 94103

checklist.name: Site Plan with Building Location
checklist.description: Detailed site plan showing building footprint, setbacks, and surrounding context
checklist.notes: Must show existing and proposed conditions

checklist.name: Architectural Drawings
checklist.description: Complete set of architectural plans, elevations, sections, and details
checklist.notes: Must include all four elevations and typical wall sections

checklist.name: Structural Plans and Calculations
checklist.description: Structural engineering drawings and design calculations
checklist.notes: Must address seismic design per ASCE 7

checklist.name: Geotechnical Report
checklist.notes: Required for all new construction and major alterations

checklist.name: Green Building Checklist
checklist.description: SF Green Building Code compliance checklist
checklist.notes: San Francisco has stricter requirements than state CalGreen

checklist.name: Fire/Life Safety Plans
checklist.description: Fire protection system plans and life safety features
checklist.notes: Include means of egress and fire alarm systems

checklist.name: Accessibility Compliance (CASp)
checklist.description: California accessibility requirements and CASp inspection
checklist.notes: Show compliance with Title 24 Part 2 accessibility standards

checklist.name: Stormwater Management Plan
checklist.description: Stormwater control and water quality measures
checklist.notes: Must comply with SF Public Utilities Commission requirements

checklist.name: Transit Impact Analysis
checklist.description: Transportation demand management and transit analysis

conditionalRequirement.condition: Required for projects over 25,000 sq ft or 20+ residential units

checklist.name: Historic Preservation Review
checklist.description: Review for buildings 50+ years old or in historic districts

conditionalRequirement.condition: Required for historic resources and buildings in historic districts

checklist.notes: Check if property is a designated landmark or in historic district

checklist.name: Shadow Analysis
checklist.description: Analysis of shadows cast on public parks and open spaces

conditionalRequirement.condition: Required for buildings over 40 feet near protected parks

checklist.notes: Required to protect sunlight access to public parks per Proposition K

fees.calculationMethod: Based on construction valuation and project type
